title: No Regrets, No Surrender
description: This is the sixth book in the bestselling series, Always a Marine, and the sequel to, "Retreat Hell! She Just Got Here", the second book in this series.At the end of their night of frenzied passion, Jazz Winters walked away from the only two men who’d ever made her feel like a woman. Logan Cavanaugh and Zach Evans let her go, but only if she swore all her future leaves to them. For fourteen, excruciatingly long months, they’ve waited for her, visiting when they could, but the demands of Mike’s Place only let them go one at a time.Jazz’s fear that a ménage can’t last a lifetime is founded in her very middle-class, middle-American upbringing. The stress of years of military service in hot zones, combined with life-threatening injuries, pushes her to the edge. When she comes home, she’s the wounded warrior, not the woman she thinks they want. But Zach and Logan are right there to help her, even when she resists.She’s not alone. And whether she chooses one man or both, they have no regrets and they won’t surrender.
author: Heather Long
